text: The Gambling Terror is a 1937 American western film directed by Sam Newfield and starring Johnny Mack Brown, Iris Meredith and Charles King.Pitts p.121 ==Partial cast== * Johnny Mack Brown as Jeff Hayes * Iris Meredith as Betty Garret * Charles King as Brett * Dick Curtis as Dirk - Brett's Henchman * Ted Adams as Sheriff * Horace Murphy as Missouri Bill, Printer's Devil * Earl Dwire as Homer Bradley * Frank Ball as Garret - Weekly Star Editor * Bobby Nelson as Jerry Garret * Lloyd Ingraham as Old Man * Emma Tansey as Old Woman * Budd Buster as Rancher Shor ==References== ==Bibliography== * Pitts, Michael R. Western Movies: A Guide to 5,105 Feature Films. McFarland, 2012. ==External links== * Category:1937 films Category:1937 Western (genre) films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:Republic Pictures films Category:Films directed by Sam Newfield Category:American black-and-white films
title: The Gambling Terror
